refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If the value of man.indent.verbatims is non-zero, the width of the left margin for output of verbatim environments (programlisting, screen, and so on) is set to the value of the man.indent.width parameter (3n by default). If instead the value of man.indent.verbatims is zero, the built-in roff default width (7.2n) is used.
